website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive but effective escape tool makes an excellent gift for new drivers in the family. The entry-level price is hard to beat.
pros: Bright orange casing is very visible

customer_reviews.title: Only for AS2 windows - check each car window for the number!
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE DON'T BUY THIS. IT ONLY WORKS ON OLDER CARS WITH TEMPERED AS2 GLASS. NEWER CARS HAVE LAMINATED AS1 OR AS3 GLASS WHICH DOES NOT BREAK - a required safety feature for accidents. CHECK YOUR CAR WINDOWS FOR THE NUMBER. This item should not even be sold anymore and is misleading to consumers who need to know the correct action to take...and this tool isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: islandg

customer_reviews.title: works as designed
customer_reviews.text: I tested this product on a pickle jar; barely tapped the jar and it cracked all over. Tested the seat belt cutter on a booklet of paper and it cut right through. I am confident this product works as designed :)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel F.

customer_reviews.title: My sister had to use one like this when her car flipped over
customer_reviews.text: This feels solid. I won't use the mount though. I'm sure I would be in a panic trying to pry it out in an emergency. My sister had to use one like this when her car flipped over. She was able to cut her seatbelt and her three childrens too.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: A must have for all cars!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter came upon a mom who had accidentally locked her toddler in a car and we are in hot Houston, TX. My daughter got out her tool and got that toddler out of the hot car before emergency services could get there. Everyone should have one of these tools in his or her car!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Newman

customer_reviews.title: but tested on some old tie down straps and it cut like butter. Good sturdy hammer and easy gripping feel
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten to actually try it out in an emergency situation, but tested on some old tie down straps and it cut like butter. Good sturdy hammer and easy gripping feel. The tips are stupid sharp. I have no doubt they'll bust you free with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend for anyone that drives a car. Please buy for your kids. I've never worried about breaking the window if I needed to but I have worried about my seatbelt jamming and I can't get out of a situation. This eliminates this worry and I keep it in the console for easy access. Wonderful addition to halo recharger, lights, first aid kit, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Important emergency tool for car
customer_reviews.text: This is a very important tool for emergency situations in car. I wish I never have to use this tool, but in case of an emergency situation, I need that. It easily fits inside the driver's side or passenger's side door or even inside the space between the driver and the passenger. The blade feels very sharp to cut the seat belt and the hammer is very pointed. I think it will serve it's purpose when needed and the price is the best deal you can find on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Raihan Khan

customer_reviews.title: Buy something with a little more weight to it.
customer_reviews.text: Had the chance to use it on a passenger side car window tonight. After several strikes the window would not shatter only pierce the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I survived by the Grace of God..
customer_reviews.text: Got hit broadside, the impact jammed my seat against the console so I could not unbuckle. It took 45 seconds to get free, then all the doors were jammed. If my Jeep had caught fire, I'd be toast. Got one in every vehicle now.
customer_reviews.author: John Mattingly

customer_reviews.title: This product looks and feels like it will do the job
customer_reviews.text: This product looks and feels like it will do the job. It does not feel cheap. Its weight feels heavy enough to do the job of breaking a window. Like many reviewers, I really can't say it will do its job 100% certain until I have to use it. The cost is great!
customer_reviews.author: Damen C.

customer_reviews.title: Should be kept in every car and In reach of driver!!
customer_reviews.text: I ditched the base and just put Velcro on so it wasn’t as bulky and then put within reach of driver seat. Hope never to have to use it but happy I have it just Incase!!
customer_reviews.author: Chuchi*

customer_reviews.title: Kept one, gave one to our daughter!
customer_reviews.text: Can't rate durability because we've only had it a couple months. My husband took ours to the local towing company & asked if he could try it out on one of the "totaled" cars in their lot. It cut the seat belt just fine, once he got the hang of how it should work & it did break the back passenger window. This comes as a pair and we gave the 2nd to our daughter. Hope we NEVER have to use it but it gives us peace of mind that we have one in our car & our daughter has one.
customer_reviews.author: M.C. - St. Paul, MN

customer_reviews.title: Hefty tool
customer_reviews.text: I kinda expected this to be cheap and plastic-y, but to my surprise, it's actually got some weight to it...without being heavy. Of course, I can't comment on the ease of use or how well it works. It comes with an instructional booklet that says, "Please assess if the use of this tool is actually necessary (paraphrased)," and I haven't happened upon such a situation. Hopefully I never need it, but if I do I hope it works. I've watched too many movies where people's cars swerve into lakes and they're trapped, so I purchased this and several others for each of my family members.
customer_reviews.author: Nalita

customer_reviews.title: Good to have just in case
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness I haven't had to use it yet, but I like knowing I have it for my car just in case. I wish it had velcro so that I could attach it to my inside door down low.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Not the highest quality but will definitely ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Not the highest quality but will definitely serve the purpose. A must have for every vehicle in my opinion. Better to have it and not need it than need it and not have it.
customer_reviews.author: Mastodon

customer_reviews.title: Not tested but important for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately, I have not had to use this product but I am giving it a high rating because it's important that everyone have something like this in their car for emergencies. The case is nice because it protects the seatbelt cutter so you won't slice your finger if you're looking for something in the same compartment as this in your car. I bought this after getting an email from my car insurance company with advice about the "top eight items to keep in your car." Make sure to put this in a center console or driver's side door so that if you do need it, you can reach it while you're wearing your seatbelt!
customer_reviews.author: bheckelTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Extra for a family member
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used them but it is nice to be prepared in a state that has so many lakes and rivers. Its a big bigger which can be a concern for limited space in some cars. We also have a smaller spring loaded version which is supposedly supposed to work underwater unlike this one when totally submerged.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy T.

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: Can't rate something I haven't used, and hope to never have to. But as a first responder myself, depending on the accident you may not be able to roll down windows. You may have to get into someone else's car, who knows? I've always preferred using a window punch and my pocket knife, and still will. But these are great to have because you never know what you'll be able to get to. What I will say is that they do seem to be just as high quality as a brand Life Hammer, and seem as though they will do the job. Lastly you can't beat getting two for the price.
customer_reviews.author: James Stefanski

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Tested out the seatbelt cutter on thick junk mail envelopes and it sliced right through. Tested the window breaker on a mason jar and with little effort, it cracked all around and broke through. Definitely a must-have for your vehicle and a GREAT price.
customer_reviews.author: Payton

customer_reviews.title: Safety Precaution
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully we have not had to use this tool, but I feel comfortable knowing that we have one in both of our vehicles, plus I gave one to my son and to my grandson. It seems extremely well made, fits easily into the pocket on inside of driver's seat door, and looks like it will do what it claims. Sure hope so but certainly hope we never need to find out. I would recommend it, however, just to be on the safe side. It makes a great stocking stuffer for the drivers in your family.
customer_reviews.author: C. Luckie

customer_reviews.title: Re: great safety product for auto
customer_reviews.text: Comforting to know that I have a great tool for my loved ones that drive, just in case they get into a jam or if stuck in a flash flood emergency. I bought three, great price! I would definitely recommend! 👍LS
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Safety tool
customer_reviews.text: Well made and as described. I installed in three different vehicles. I mounted each one on the driver's door just in front of the armrest/window door lock area. I used 1 inch drywall screws. Since that area does have some curved area I drilled a new hole so that I could use three screws to be sure it was securely attached. I do not recommend that the tool be in the car and not securely attached and easily accessible to the driver.
customer_reviews.author: Maranda Carter

customer_reviews.title: Apparently a valuable item
customer_reviews.text: Never had to use it but like knowing it’s there. Bought one for each driver in my family. Good price. My sisters car got busted into and it’s all that was Stolen so if you see a review that it’s helpful for Burglaries let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny J.

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind ✔️
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little xmas gift for my family members. Bought one for myself as well. Toss the block mount is comes with. It’s too hard to pull it out from the mount and when its an emergency, the last thing i need is to struggle trying to get the tool. I attached this underneath the lid of my middle console with some velcro. Also, the ugly Amazon Basics logo is easily removable. Gives the tool a clean orange look
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Window tool worked great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My wife was rear ended at a light by a woman having a seizure. The woman’s doors were locked so my wife used the tool with one tap to shatter the woman’s passenger side window easily and shut off her engine. Well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Kind of wish the had more of a backing on ...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of wish the had more of a backing on them so you could use 3M tape and not have to screw them into your auto.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A worthwhile tool for your car
customer_reviews.text: Listen. I don't live by the ocean and I rarely drive by the lake. My most threatening body of water is a retaining pond. But for some reason having this in both of our cars brings me great comfort. I also like that it has a seatbelt cutter. It doesn't cost much at all and it could come in handy even though we all hope will never have to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Midwestern Lady

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had to use it, but confident in its quality.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to use it, and I hope I don't. That being said, I feel a lot safer having it around. I buy one for every car owner in my family. However the last one I bought didn't come with any connector in the back. I used to mount them on my roof near the rear view mirror, but now it just has to sit loose in my door cubby. I really wish they still came with the little prongs :(
customer_reviews.author: Ellington

customer_reviews.title: Seems like they will do the job when needed
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars because they do seem sturdy enough to do the job. I won't know if they deserve 5 stars unless I ever need to use one. Hopefully I will not. I will say, one day it seemed my seat belt would NOT unclip and I was wondering what technique I was going to have to use to get myself out from under the darn thing; it finally released. Now that I have this tool, I feel assured that if worse comes to worse I do have the ability to cut the darn strap. As far as breaking glass goes, I feel now I have a fighting chance.
customer_reviews.author: SonoraTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: News of accident prompt purchase
customer_reviews.text: Amazon basics delivers again. Bought after news of an overturned vehicle on new years day. The lady was trapped and water was entering the vehicle. Her phone was missing but was able to dial 911 w/ her apple watch. Dispatcher asked if she could free herself but could not. That is when shebrealized she could have with one of these.
customer_reviews.author: CosmicBoss

customer_reviews.title: A great peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: Thank the Good Lord, I’ve never had to use this in a real life emergency and pray it never comes to that. I do believe in being prepared and it gives me a peace knowing that my husband and I have one on each side should the worst arrive. With gorgeous because in the backseat and horror stories of car seat tragedies in accidents, I can feel a peace that we have the right tools. Be safe, be cautious, order this.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Briceba

customer_reviews.title: Be Safe!
customer_reviews.text: I had never thought of the need for this tool, but after attending a defensive driving class and a discussion recommending this type of tool which could help save your life and/or another’s. I purchased a two pack. My wife and each have one in our cars. I hope we never have to use them, but certainly feel safer knowing they are there for an emergency!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: I havent felt any other ones so cannot offer a ...
customer_reviews.text: I havent felt any other ones so cannot offer a direct comparison. But I have to say, it does feel a bit cheap. I pray that I would never have to use it but if and when I do need to, I hope it does do its job
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy T

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this item.
customer_reviews.text: Paid way more for the same thing out of a catalog. Got this for my sons car at a much better price and it's exactly the same as the expensive one. Haven't had to use it...hopefully never will.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: I hope I never have to use it, but it good to know its there in an emergency for you or someone else. I brought one for every member of my family. Read the instructions, as how to use it. Main point if to break the window by hitting it right in the middle. Reading instructions on use will help, thats what its for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled that Amazon made their own of these
customer_reviews.text: At 1 for my son's car and one for mine. I've always wanted to have fun in my car because I watch way too many movies and it has always been a fear of mine to be locked in my car. But the price point has always been a little high. Once I saw that Amazon was doing their own I was sold. So now I have peace of mind for both my son and I.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob's mom

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This comes in one box, and the box is not a "giftable" quality. The hammers are light, and come in their own holder, which allows you to bolt them down in your car. Easily fits in the glovebox. I got these cause I have 2 vehicles. This seems to be big enough so you can better protect your hand when smashing a car window. Really good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have piece of mind having this in my car. Great instrument! I am a Real Estate Agent and was having difficulty removing zip-ties from a large 4x8 sign. This gadget cut right through the zip-ties so I feel confident that it would cut through a seat belt if needed. I purchased one for my daughter also.
customer_reviews.author: Anna P

customer_reviews.title: Solid build
customer_reviews.text: Feels slightly awkward in hand, but not too where it would be difficult to use. Both points are sharp, construction seems very sturdy, and the bracket it comes in is a pretty good design. Hopefully I'll never find out just how well it works, but based on how it is built I don't think there will be any issue if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Convience
customer_reviews.text: Had bought a similar item at the local auto parts store years ago for main travel vehicle. When I wanted one for my other vehicle, the item was on the stores web site, but no longer carried in the store. This is exactly what I was looking for to have in the vehicle in case of an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: HBNC

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, low price and solid material.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t give a full review until I use it (and I hope I never have to); but it is well made, solid material with a light weight so it’ll swing well if you need to break a window.
customer_reviews.author: G. W. Noon

customer_reviews.title: Seems quite durable
customer_reviews.text: I can't write a thorough review on these but they seem to be quite durable and of decent construction. The points on the head seem well made. The seatbelt cutter blade appears very sharp. At such an affordable price these should be in every vehicle on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Piorier

customer_reviews.title: Thankfully not used yet but seems very durable
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what the case/holder really does for it but the items of good quality and durable with the strike point being heavy metal. Small enough to fit in the door of my car for quick access if ever needed. Lets hope not.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleC P.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to evaluate how good these are until you have used them!
customer_reviews.text: This is a rare item in that you buy it and hope you'll never have to use it. But, like insurance, it's nice to have. I bought a kit on impulse. I had been thinking for years that this might be a good thing to keep in the car, but it's quite easy to delay buying it. When I eventually need it and have used it, I will post an update. I imagine that will not be for a while, and I hope my high ratings remain unchanged. It certainly _seems_ to have been substantially made.
customer_reviews.author: David L. P.

customer_reviews.title: Substantial product
customer_reviews.text: This was not expensive and I expected cheap plastic. But plastic thick and hefty, and fits nicely into plastic guard that comes with it. I hope I will never have to report on how it functions, but having it makes me feel safe. It’s bigger than expected—barely fits in middle compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Grate Tool, I have already used 3 times,
customer_reviews.text: Grate Tool, I have already used 3 times, I am going to tell every Safety Person I know about this Safety Tool.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Wahlert

customer_reviews.title: Car necessity for you or someone else.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and seems sturdy enough, lightweight and easy to remove in case of an emergency. Hope to never have the need to use it. But I got it with the intention of being able to rescue anyone or myself from the car or in the even that I ever come across an accident where this could be handy.
customer_reviews.author: Ana M.

customer_reviews.title: Bought 4 of these
customer_reviews.text: We have new drivers in our house and after a friend (real person, I know) actually used one to brake a window after they came upon an accident... I felt for the money, it was a decent investment.
customer_reviews.author: The Allart’s

customer_reviews.title: Great if you’re in a pinch.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat bulky, but after doing some tests with these types of instruments (not specifically this one), I can say i’m sure it will be better than nothing in a pinch. I gifted one to my mom and one to my girlfriend.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Well Built Vehicle Rescue Device.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it looks well built. Can't say we've tried it yet, and I honestly hope we never have to. It's reasonably priced, as long as it works as advertised for that one time it's necessary, I'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Gruber

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these. One in each car just in case an emergency. You never know when you need this. Better safe than sorry. I work in the medical field and have seen too many accidents where this device has been used and has made the difference. Honestly I think this should be in every car....
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift and stocking stuffer!
customer_reviews.text: These are indispensable for a safety tool in your car or truck. Be sure to Anchor it someplace it within easy reach. Don't just keep it in the glove compartment or the console. Needs to be where you can get at it.
customer_reviews.author: William Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Good seat belt cutters and window glass breakers
customer_reviews.text: These tools allow the user to cut through a seat belt and to safely break an auto’s window and knock the remaining glass out of the frame in order to safely exit after an accident or other emergency
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet effective insurance
customer_reviews.text: Tested it on a junk car. DId what it was supposed to do. Cut the seat beat with no problem. Tried the hammer on a side window and was able to break it. I have placed them in every car in a spot where it would be readily accessible in a roll over or a wreck.
customer_reviews.author: whyme

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high-quality and well-made tool. Hopefully, I'll never have to use it! Be it feels sturdy enough to get the job done. I bought two (one for my car and one for my husband's) since the price is so low!
customer_reviews.author: rufareal

customer_reviews.title: Get yourself one!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second tool. This one is better than the first because it releases from the storage handle easier and it has more leverage when swinging to break a window. (You don't want to put your fist through a broken window)
customer_reviews.author: mybookchatter

customer_reviews.title: Safety First
customer_reviews.text: A great stocking stuffer for the guys in my family to remind them to always be safe while driving. Driving can be dangerous, and so scary. This item can help give you a safe piece of mind that there is an extra safety precaution in case it's needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jay88

customer_reviews.title: Tool is ok but holder is of no use
customer_reviews.text: 2 pack, looks like it will break the window or cut the seatbelt. Holder is of little value. Should come with a holder you can stick to console or dashboard for easy access in a crash.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice surprise
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift to several people and they all loved them. Its something they would never buy themselves but thought it was a good idea to have. They all were very thankful!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Very small and light
customer_reviews.text: Kinda hard to rate something I've (thank God) never needed to use. But they're so light. I can't see it actually busting out a car window in an emergency. Hopefully I'll never have to find out. I would consider something little heavier amd bigger.
customer_reviews.author: aLauraBorealis

customer_reviews.title: Love mine
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for someone who just got their first car or a new car. I think everyone should have one of these in their center console. Especially those with kids!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Feels good
customer_reviews.text: So I've never busted a window with these... But if I had to this feels really good. The point is sharp as all heck and really feels up to the job. I'm not experimenting on my car... But I have this as a rescue tool in my car
customer_reviews.author: Thomas The tank engine

customer_reviews.title: Great price, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I went to a local hardware store to buy a couple of these and was stunned at the price they were charging. I ordered online and was able to get six for the price that two would have been in the store. My wife and I and four friends all have them now. Florida is filled with canals. Don't drive without one of these in your car.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Lower

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared
customer_reviews.text: Can't write and glowing review because I've never actually had to use it, and I hope I never do because that would mean something bad has happen. But that being said I am big proactive into safety and this is definitely a "better safe than sorry" item
customer_reviews.author: Byron Kempf

customer_reviews.title: Emergency
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grand daughters to have in car if for any reason they have to break their window or get stuck in their seatbelt . Compact and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: IKat2u2

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very sturdy, great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great value product ... you never know when you will need it, and is very good quality / sturdy for the price. Have one in mine and my wifes car. Great job Amazon Basics!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Durable, great value!
customer_reviews.text: Received them today, one for my car and one for my daughter's. Seem very durable. I hope we never have to use them but glad we have then in case we do.
customer_reviews.author: GaPeach

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Meh. For the price these are fine but they don’t scream quality by any means. They are pretty small.
customer_reviews.author: brad10380

customer_reviews.title: Bought multiples
customer_reviews.text: I bought several for Christmas stocking stuffers and they were a hit. Haven't had to use them yet, thank God, but they seem durable and will do the job. If they get used I will give an update.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDeeB

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to have one of each in my cars for Emergency. Have not physically use them hope I never will but they look and feel as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should be Required Safety Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Screwed into the center console. This should be a required piece of safety equipment in a vehicle. Don’t risk getting caught in your car!
customer_reviews.author: TheReviewerGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great Safety Tool!
customer_reviews.text: I have thought for several years that this is the greatest safety thing U can have in your vehicle. I have given one to every driver in my family & also to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn A. Mitch

customer_reviews.title: For safety
customer_reviews.text: I had a fear of getting trapped in my car during a fire or in a body of water so I bought this product. I hope I never have to use this but will be happy that I have it.
customer_reviews.author: ShanShan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The holder has screw holes and lashing slots which offer a variety of mounting options. These things smashed right through a glass jar, so I believe anyone could get through auto glass with a little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very important tool!
customer_reviews.text: Must have in every car, I have one on each side of the car in the event the driver is unconscious and unable to pass the tool to the passenger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: How could someone dislike this item? Serves a very important service should it be necessary to use it. Worth the money for 2 pieces. Everyone should have one of these items in their autos.
customer_reviews.author: I am Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: Great little gizmo to have in the car. Some of the reviews said the blade wasn't sharp enough but I tested mine and it is very sharp. Gave it as a gift and they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Vergara

customer_reviews.title: A little large to find convenient place in vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Just didn’t expect that I can’t find a convenient place to put this in my vehicle. Not sure how the bracket is helpful and where to install
customer_reviews.author: Vlynb

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I watched a video on how to save yourself if car goes under water. These were highly recommended and love that it has the seat belt cut option. Gave one to my daughter too! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Teri Graham

customer_reviews.title: Feels like it will work
customer_reviews.text: The design and construction seems like it will work in an emergency, but I have no way to test it. Since I've never had any such device before, I'd say it is better than having nothing.
customer_reviews.author: mattroffact

customer_reviews.title: Hard to rate products like this. I gave it a four but really ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to rate products like this. I gave it a four but really I don't know what else to give it because it's just sitting in my glove compartment. Haven't used it, hope I never will.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Y. C.

customer_reviews.title: Useful tools.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these tools for others and they were nicely packaged and delivered quickly. The recipients were happy to receive them.
customer_reviews.author: Schwatzwalder

customer_reviews.title: We have one in each car
customer_reviews.text: This window breaker hammer is compact and light and it's sturdy and it works great, with increase of accidents you never know what might happen so I try to be ready for anything my emergency kit is complete very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Jenny F.

customer_reviews.title: Better to Have and Not Need
customer_reviews.text: This tool is better to have and not need it, than the opposite. I bought one for several family members for their birthdays.
customer_reviews.author: K. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: You never know when you’ll be in an emergent situation. I’m a super cautious person so I’m glad I bought this when I did.
customer_reviews.author: Desha Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good tool to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my daughter to keep in her glove box. She is a college student and travels back and forth to school.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: simple but effective
customer_reviews.text: its a simple and easy to use device that can save your life. light weight and fits comfortably in my glove box
customer_reviews.author: Anand Ramtahal

customer_reviews.title: Good to have, just in case
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bunch of these, and put one in each of my vehicles. I also gave one to each family member. Even if you're lucky enough to never need to use it for yourself, there are plenty of accident scenes where something like this can quickly help someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Ali R.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it is at low cost
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot to review other than every car should have one and the Amazon basics make it easy and cheap to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Solid Buy
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately, I haven't had to use it yet. I do like it's size, bigger than the one I store in my other vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Shopwise

customer_reviews.title: important to keep in car
customer_reviews.text: I have had one for a while, got these to give kids to keep in their cars, important to have in case of emergency
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: I must have in your vehicles if you live around water
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for an emergency hammer. Good to have that extra security in vehicles living around the water
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Life saver.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should have these in their car. Smashing your window and cutting a seat belt will save your life.
customer_reviews.author: Prentice

customer_reviews.title: Reliable sturdy and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very effective tool, costs a few bucks but could potentially save a life. It’s smart to be prepared and I believe every vehicle has enough room to carry a tool such as this.
customer_reviews.author: ItsBest

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I pray I don’t ever have to use this but glad to know its in my car if I do! Great size and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Safety item for my vehicles - JUST IN CASE
customer_reviews.text: I hope to never have to use these but keep one in the glove compartment of each of my vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Fillmann

customer_reviews.title: Window and seat belt cutter
customer_reviews.text: This a must safely device to have to free you and your passengers when are trapped inside your vehicle in an emergency ( vehicle sinks in water for an example
customer_reviews.author: Jason Robert Klemm

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars 🌟🌟🌟🌟
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars well built and a must for everyone's Vehicle/Automobile. Good price. Thank You Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Scorpion1leader

customer_reviews.title: Safety First!
customer_reviews.text: What peace of mind it gives me to know that each of out cars have one of these safety escape tools in case of a dire emergency! Hopefully we will never need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawny Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should carry one in their car
customer_reviews.text: There cheap and can save your life in an emergency so why not keep one in your car.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nakamura

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Emergency Seat Belt Cutter and Window Hammer Tool, Car Accessories
feature_bullets: 2-in-1 emergency-escape tool provides a window hammer and seat-belt cutter; 2-pack
Hard tungsten metal double-head hammer for quickly breaking a car-door window
Sharp blade for easily cutting through a seat belt; bright-orange plastic handle provides a secure grip
Designed to help escape from a sinking, over-turned, crashed, or burning car
Protective bracket included for safe storage; store in center console or driver-side door pocket
Backed by an AmazonBasics limited 1-year warranty
